name: Sweet Bread Pudding Parfait
author: Anonymous
summary: Seasonal fruit and an easy-to-prepare bread pudding are layered in parfait glasses in this delicious chilled dessert.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) loaf King's Hawaiian® Sweet Bread
1 ½ cups Assorted seasonal berries or fruit
directions: Cut sweet bread into 1-inch cubes and place into pan
Whisk together eggs and sugar in a bowl
Pour milk and vanilla in and stir until it is well incorporated
Pour custard mixture over the bread and let soak for 10 minutes
Cover with foil and bake at 350 degrees F for 35 - 45 minutes
Let bread pudding cool for 2 hours
Using a round cutter, sized for parfait glass, cut out 3 sets per glass
Alternate fruits and bread pudding in the glass
Top with purchased vanilla dessert sauce or try melted vanilla ice cream for a quick sauce
